description: Mad Wizard’s Hall, a collection of pre-painted wooden dungeon tiles designed for tabletop RPGs and miniatures games, is now live on Gamefound. This campaign offers an updated and expanded version of the 28mm scale dungeon tiles created by Ilya, a designer from Vilnius, Lithuania. The set includes over 80 pieces, offering a wide variety of...
title: Mad Wizard’s Hall: Pre-Painted Dungeon Tile Set Now on Gamefound

description: Since 2019, Kromlech has celebrated Orktober, a month-long event that brings together fans and hobbyists of tabletop wargaming to enjoy all things Orc. This year, Orktober 2024 starts on 1 October 2024 at 10:00 AM (GMT+2), with an exciting lineup of new Orc miniatures. Kromlech will introduce an exclusive range of miniatures featuring dynamic designs...
title: Kromlech’s Orktober 2024 Begins with New Orc Miniature Releases

description: Stephen Glicker of Roll For Combat recently shared some eye-opening data on the sales of the 2024 edition of the Dungeons & Dragons Player’s Handbook. Despite Wizards of the Coast’s press release declaring it the “fastest-selling Dungeons & Dragons product ever,” actual sales numbers appear to tell a different story. In their press release, WOTC...
title: WOTC Inflates Sales Numbers for Player’s Handbook – Real Figures Might Be Shockingly Low
